tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_consent_forms (
    form_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    consent_date DATE,
    consent_given BOOLEAN,
    patient_signature BLOB
);

CREATE TABLE documentation_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    record_type VARCHAR(255),
    created_date TIMESTAMP,
    document TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Documentations (
    document_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_size INT,
    uploaded_by VARCHAR(50),
    uploaded_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ConsentForm (
    form_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    form_date DATE,
    form_details TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Documentation (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    form_id INT,
    doc_type VARCHAR(20),
    doc_content TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (form_id) REFERENCES ConsentForm(form_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doc_id INT,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
    compliance_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (doc_id) REFERENCES Documentation(doc_id)
);
